145160f5e21b80c27dc93a1904fe33b9afd4f212.commitMessage: Issue #3773: start to remove classLoader from checkstyle

87a3357169fa8e91ebfae23b4dcccad60943abd7.commitMessage: Issue #6485: added tabWidth to Checker and populated it to all checks

327c0bc843612486ab4ded32a2f01038e1271fd0.commitMessage: Issue #3254: UT to verify all property types and values in XDocs

326e3ae67b8cc2a1dcbcf2356b30fd9a4afa964a.commitMessage: Added the option "charset" to the header checks to allow controlling the encoding of the header file (rfe 1952641).

fe9057366308642868c25d427c3ee94411b37170.commitMessage: Apply patch #1914806 for PackageNamesLoader from Lars Koedderitzsch.

8fe7c3a914d75fa7b20fb5115b08dade9ed7c88c.commitMessage:
Fix for infrastructure class loader. Needs to be verified by Lars (of
Eclipse plug-in fame! :-)

66325cbd72882454193765322efa716537ce9c93.commitMessage: Now PackageObjectFactory uses custom class loader.

e708beb537e90a913c8692174dbdf48c5277d014.commitMessage:
Strip basename from reported secondary filename in StrictDuplicateCodeCheck.
Required moving getStrippedFileName() from Checker to Utils.

d216ec75255a120ce7c24e51da7df63a2b9864de.commitMessage:
Major refactorings to allow the use of SeverityLevels in FileSetChecks
as well as in Checks and to simplify logging of messages in FileSetChecks.

Introduction of a new class called AbstractViolationReporter, from which
both Check and FileSetCheck are derived.

Severity is passed to submodules by means of the Contextualizable
mechanism. This means that the user can f.ex. set severity to INFO
in a TreeWalker and all Checks below that TreeWalker will use severity INFO.

88e89a138aa39f50f7642106cde6568f6e07783f.commitMessage: Changed implementation of module name resolution from inheritance to delegation approach

08d6efe49d2960d9bd61bfb9cca65910f0c19b58.commitMessage:
make AutomaticBean.configure() final and provide defined extension points
to prevent programming errors in user classes.
